about_the_game:
Do you desire more SNES-Styled backgrounds but you’re afraid that the ones available don’t quite match the flair or the taste of your project?

Then why not try PIXELLEN BATTLE BACKGROUNDS PACK? It is a pixel art, retro-styled, battle background pack that fits well into RPG Maker for anyone needing to make old-timey RPGs but want something slightly more different with a slightly smaller pixel size. Easy to add and use, its image size covers most of the common RPG Maker game resolutions!

With 12 backgrounds, they offer some variety and something for all, whether it be traditional, sci-fi or even modern day!

Features:
12 Pixel art Battlebacks.
Inspired on SNES RPGs.
Formatted for use in RPG Maker MV and MZ.
Covers most of the common RPG Maker game resolutions.
All the images provided are for RPG Maker usage.
